website_summaries.verdict: Not only is this grill gazebo nice to look at, its vented canopy will send smoke up and away.
pros: Two shelves are built in for convenience

customer_reviews.title: This is great, we got it and set it up
customer_reviews.text: This is great, we got it and set it up, easy to do, instructions aren't super detailed, but it's clear enough from the text and pictures. There is also a video on lowes website that showed how to assemble a very similar gazebo, really the only difference is this one requires a wrench or socket set (comes with a cheap little pressed metal wrench, but if you have a socket set, it will go much quicker), the one in the video used different fasteners (hand tightened knobs basically), but the rest of the video was helpful, so if you are having trouble, just sear sunjoy gazebo on lowes website and check out the video.
customer_reviews.author: M. Stevenson

customer_reviews.title: easy assembly. Only reason I gave 4 stars
customer_reviews.text: Very well made, easy assembly. Only reason I gave 4 stars, the .rain pools up on the one end. Not sure if a design flaw or maybe an installation flaw. I had tossed around different ideas on how to mount this in my yard so the wind does not carry it away or destroy it. I mounted it to (4) full size Chevy brake rotors that I got from a local repair shop that were scrap then covered the rotors with mulch. The very next day we received a storm with 50 mph winds and it stood like a trooper.
customer_reviews.author: bob

customer_reviews.title: This arrived as promised and was quite easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: This arrived as promised and was quite easy to assemble. It looks very nice assembled and I like the shelves and hooks. The problem started with the very first rain we received. The top quickly filled with water and caused the top to stretch. We removed the collection of water but the damage was done -- the entire top sags and every rain results in the same large pockets of water. VERY DISAPPOINTED. The design should have addressed the support issues for the top. UPDATE - due to the amazing customer service from Amazon, I was able get this resolved. THANK YOU AMAZON!!
customer_reviews.author: MDavis

customer_reviews.title: Another use for the Gazebo
customer_reviews.text: Using Gazebo as a cover for a garden swing that had a damaged top. It fits just fine as a great Canopy. The packaging of the Gazebo was excellent. Great attention to detail!
customer_reviews.author: knightsir

customer_reviews.title: ... swing since my top was destroyed by wind I like it
customer_reviews.text: Delivered on time no damage I ordered this for different purposes than grill I use this for my swing since my top was destroyed by wind I like it
customer_reviews.author: ecz

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful product, just needed something bigger
customer_reviews.text: This gazebo was beautiful, well packaged, easy to install, and looked great. I just changed my mind and decided I needed something bigger to enjoy my back patio in inclement weather. Return was fast and easy though it was complicated getting everything back in the box, I recommend taking pictures of the box contents after every layer. I put up by myself (I am 6 ft, 150 lbs), unless you count my dog laying around supervising. I ended up getting Sunjoy L-GZ933PST 12′ x 10′ Cabin-Style gazebo, and am so thrilled. Thankful it came with mosquito netting too. No matter how hard it storms I can find a dry spot underneath.
customer_reviews.author: J. BushTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: I was outside in the elements grilling like a 16th century peasant until I came across this ...
customer_reviews.text: I was outside in the elements grilling like a 16th century peasant until I came across this product. I live in the North East and like to grill year round and I was always getting rained on, snowed on, and all around drenched. Now I can just stand outside and not have to worry about catching pneumonia while making dinner.
customer_reviews.author: CJ

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love it.. A little difficult for me to assemble but my grandson did great.
customer_reviews.author: Maxine Hill

customer_reviews.title: I am really happy with this product now that I have finally gotten ...
customer_reviews.text: I am really happy with this product now that I have finally gotten it together. My complaint is with the directions. They are not clear enough and I put the thing 1/2 way together only to realize I didn’t have the legs the right way. It was harder to take apart than it was to put together. If the directions were a little clearer it would have gone together in 45minutes. It’s packaged very well, especially the hardware and it seems sturdy and well made. I am very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: A. Baker

customer_reviews.title: Warranty is bogus
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to cover my grill. Canopy faded after only a month or two. Ad says non-fading, BS I say. Warranty doc on Amazon opens and says to contact them through a contact us link or call this 800 number. All the 800 number does is direct you to an 'award' department where they try to get your personal information to give you a free gift card. All they do is say the other line is 'busy' so you got transferred here. Warranty on Amazon says 6 months! Come on now, don't buy this product, no matter how well built it is, there is no real 'company' behind it.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: So It's been less than a year and the top ...
customer_reviews.text: So It's been less than a year and the top of the canopy began stretching a bit (expected) and ripping (not expected) on the corners. Product still works but now when it rains, it holds water and you have to manually take it out in order to avoid more stretching on the nylon. For the price and use I give it a 3 star, coming down from the 5 star I previously rated as product didn't last one full year form date of purchase. Will now go with seller to see about replacing top part and will continue adjusting review based on their response.
customer_reviews.author: Alan Sanchez

customer_reviews.title: I've tried several things like this but the winds in PA have destroyed everything ...
customer_reviews.text: I've tried several things like this but the winds in PA have destroyed everything I've tried except for this. It survived a nice test through some recent storms. I highly recommend it. It's not too difficult to put together (I did it by myself). My only complaint is rain does gather on one side of the canvas and I have to knock the water out after it rains.
customer_reviews.author: ChaseP WDE

customer_reviews.title: Does the job well for the price...
customer_reviews.text: This is my second - the cover will last 4-5 years max in rainy Seattle but for an inexpensive way to cover our big green egg when cooking outside in the elements it's a great deal. We put casters on ours so it can roll around easily . Customer service actually replied to emails too.
customer_reviews.author: Debora Baily

customer_reviews.title: Great Patio Accessory
customer_reviews.text: Purchased to replace a former BBQ Gazebo that we couldn't get a replacement canopy for. This price of this gazebo was less than if we would have had a custom replacement canopy made! It's sturdy when bolted to the cement patio brick area we have it setting on, the canopy is heavy and well made, was easy to put together, looks nice and has a hook inside at the top to hang a light for evening cooking. So far, no signs of rust!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Should have listened to other reviews
customer_reviews.text: I really liked this. It was tough to find black at a reasonable price. Didn't quite get the whole summer out of it. I live in the mid-Atlantic region. The rain stretched out the canopy and we ended up with a large pool of water after every time it rained. The fabric tore easily and then a moderate wind caused it to "take off" and the whole thing is a crumpled mess. Will be looking for something new this season.
customer_reviews.author: T Hop

customer_reviews.title: Great and would buy again
customer_reviews.text: Very pretty, good quality, and very cheap compared to the other options I saw. The canopy was a pain to fit but everything works great now that it is done. My only complaint is that it is VERY top heavy. So you will definitely want to bolt or spike it down (it comes with some spikes). But overall I like it and would buy again if ever needed.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Herron

customer_reviews.title: Fair for price
customer_reviews.text: Over all a great product. Construction is fairly sturdy, however when it rains the rain pools near the sides and stretches out the canvas very badly. If you don’t catch it immediately it starts to sag pretty bad. We have t had ours that long and already it’s sagging and looks like it’s always full of water
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely love this! I got two sets of shower curtains ...
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this! I got two sets of shower curtains and hung them on one side to create privacy from the neighbors yard.....perfect size for my round table and chairs and I hung a candle chandelier inside as well! (the gazebo came with two options, one was the hook to easily hand the chandelier.
customer_reviews.author: Sherry L. Ferber

customer_reviews.title: Actually really like  It'
customer_reviews.text: I love it it has held up so far for about 2 weeks under heavy wind and rain I have it screw down to a deck a lot of solar lighting attached to it my wife loves it creates a nice ambient space on my deck
customer_reviews.author: Peter F P

customer_reviews.title: This is our second gazebo and it works fine for our needs
customer_reviews.text: This is our second gazebo and it works fine for our needs. But i ordered the red and when we put it together what I received was the green. That was pretty annoying to not get quite what I ordered.
customer_reviews.author: Rayne

customer_reviews.title: wonderful
customer_reviews.text: Love this product, the only change I would make is the way in which it is anchored into the ground but otherwise than that it looks absolutely wonderful
customer_reviews.author: Nidia

customer_reviews.title: These are great to cover the grill
customer_reviews.text: These are great to cover the grill, the wind doesn't blow them around, even strong wind coming off our lake. This is the second one I have owned, the first got messed up by a tree trimmer. We had it for 4 years and no problems.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking BBQ Cover
customer_reviews.text: Very nice and would recommend if you are looking for a nice space to put your BBQ under. The only reason for the 4 star is because one of the side shelves were bent. I did not go through and ask for a replacement, we just straightened as much as we could. Other than that... I would definitely recommend the cover!
customer_reviews.author: hillpeople

customer_reviews.title: It was pretty easy to assemble and did it myself until the ...
customer_reviews.text: It was pretty easy to assemble and did it myself until the end and had some help with the top. I bought it to cover 2 large cat scratching posts I have on the patio and there was plenty of room to spare. My only complaint was two end caps were missing on the poles where the fabric attached but we improvised. It looks great and I love the red top. The cats love it too...
customer_reviews.author: DD

customer_reviews.title: Great Gazebo for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Nice Gazebo, but make sure it is tied down, very lightweight. Top tends to "pool" water on edges.
customer_reviews.author: John Ouellette

customer_reviews.title: Really easy to put together with 2 people
customer_reviews.text: Really easy to put together with 2 people, parts were super organized, which was nice. Looks great and does it's job. We have it on a concrete slab, so might have to anchor it to the fence if it gets too windy
customer_reviews.author: rosie

customer_reviews.title: it's just amazing.. I don't use the shelves at all ...
customer_reviews.text: This is on my patio, it's just amazing.. I don't use the shelves at all since this is a place to sit in the shade.. Great quality and easy to put together. Seriously, it's so easy to put together !!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: SUNJOY Grille Gazebo
customer_reviews.text: Assembly instructions are lacking, NO step by step....but NOTE: Pointing the Shelving SLOTS towards each other steered assembly a LOT. This went together in about an hour, and I would like to say the quality of manufacture is very good.
customer_reviews.author: MARS2020

customer_reviews.title: Backyard shade
customer_reviews.text: The instructions was a bit off But with 2 folks it can be done.
customer_reviews.author: sawee

customer_reviews.title: Faded glory
customer_reviews.text: Good, sturdy assembly but in less than 6 months the red color has faded significantly. Granted, Georgia experienced a hot, sunny summer but this product is supposedly designed for that. Within another season it'll have to be replaced to match table umbrella from different mfger that has lasted through 2 seasons already with little, but acceptable, fading.
customer_reviews.author: W.H. Adams Youth Foundation

customer_reviews.title: Takes Two To  Set Up
customer_reviews.text: Was set up in about an hour. Sturdy, looks great, and keeps hubby in the shade and out of the sun while BBQ’ing. Looks great!
customer_reviews.author: La Reina

customer_reviews.title: Well built Grill Gazebo
customer_reviews.text: Product was well packed and included all parts and directions. Took about 45 min to assemble alone and directions were easy to read. The cover was a real red color and works well keeping the rain off during BBQ sessions. I would recommended and buy again.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Great grill cover
customer_reviews.text: Color was correct and was easy to assemble. We will have to see how winter goes, we have screwed to the deck covering our Napoleon grill. It takes two people to put this together.
customer_reviews.author: Lewis F. Franklin

customer_reviews.title: Nice product
customer_reviews.text: We put this on our pool deck and added wooden pull shades and made a fantastic cabana!
customer_reviews.author: D. Izykowski

customer_reviews.title: Instructions are not the greatest but good value.
customer_reviews.text: A bit tricky to put together but worth it 👌
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Makowiecki

customer_reviews.title: Purchased this to have shelter over our generator. Built ...
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this to have shelter over our generator. Built a box to cover the generator when not in use, added 2 chairs and we have a covered seating area!
customer_reviews.author: Nanna Richbart

customer_reviews.title: I put the item together and I have missing parts ...
customer_reviews.text: I put the item together and I have missing parts. No instructions came with the item but an entire end brace is missing.
customer_reviews.author: WILLIAM JACOBY

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Took two of us about 4 hours to put together. Instruction a bit difficult to follow but we figured it out. All in all a super buy!
customer_reviews.author: ELIZABETH

customer_reviews.title: Nice gazebo
customer_reviews.text: Didn't use it for a grill, but had a couple of chairs that needed more shade....worked great and looks even greater!! I watched a video from Sunjoy on you tube before assembling and put it together by myself in a couple of hours...nice product. Would recommend to anyone looking for a gazebo.
customer_reviews.author: Ken I.

customer_reviews.title: Very flimsy canopy. Choose carefully. Not worth it.
customer_reviews.text: Very flimsy canopy. Already tearing and stretched out. I wouldn’t recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie

customer_reviews.title: Very well built.
customer_reviews.text: This is the best. It has been set up all winter so that I could use it as shelter over my bird feeders. It has with stood a foot of snow on top and very strong winds. Today we are having 50 mph wind gusts here in wisconsin. It is staked down very good with tie wraps around stakes. Its great.
customer_reviews.author: queenjudith

customer_reviews.title: End shelf
customer_reviews.text: It could have been a five but the end shelves are solid and do not let water go through them.
customer_reviews.author: excited

customer_reviews.title: Pool of water
customer_reviews.text: It's great, except for the fact that one side of the canopy top stretches too much when it rains and creates a pool of water, which further stretches the canvass. I have to install a piece of bamboo to help reduce this effect.
customer_reviews.author: Scott T. Schmidt

customer_reviews.title: NOT FADE RESISTANT - see photo
customer_reviews.text: NOT fade resistant as you can see - it’s only been up since Memorial Day weekend so pretty unhappy about that. Otherwise, seems sturdy so far and canopy has been fine with rain (I also haven’t it graded a bit so it drains better)
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn E Luce

customer_reviews.title: Better Price @ Amazon-great product
customer_reviews.text: Same as the one in Lowe's that was $179! Better price here and easy to assemble. LOVE the new grill cover.
customer_reviews.author: HarleyKid

customer_reviews.title: Bright and Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful! We love how it looks in perfect harmony with our bbq. Needs 2 to assembly but not difficult with a power tool ;)
customer_reviews.author: Regie Vecchiato-Vaca

customer_reviews.title: Easy to build, great performance in windy conditions
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to set up. Looks great. The vented roof makes it much more likely to survive the wind. I love the shelves but depending on where you put it, they may block access to the area under the canopy.
customer_reviews.author: Ian Coen

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. Better than original cover. Should get a few years of usage
customer_reviews.author: roryroar

customer_reviews.title: It would be nice to buy something that was made like it used to be
customer_reviews.text: The canopy didn't even last two years. This is not quality at all started to rip in the first year. I got with Amazon they told me to get with the supplier. I am a busy person and didn't get time to do that. So now I'm setting out by the pool looking at this and thought I wright this review on this product.
customer_reviews.author: Chuck

customer_reviews.title: The frame is sturdy and I love the appearance
customer_reviews.text: The canopy the first time it rained caved inwards. I don't know if it was a faulty canopy. The frame is sturdy and I love the appearance, just wish the top was stronger.
customer_reviews.author: michelle smith

customer_reviews.title: Amazon don't become a haven for crooks
customer_reviews.text: Flimsy at best. The color of the fabric fades immediately. My canopy came all damaged with twisted parts. I decided to keep it because i needed to use it rightaway . But i don't recommend buying it. Unless you Intend to use it indoors. Not the first time i get unexpectedly low quality stuff from Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: miguel a.

customer_reviews.title: Love this
customer_reviews.text: I love this canopy, it is solid and exactly as described
customer_reviews.author: Misty

customer_reviews.title: ... us a while to get it together but we love it
customer_reviews.text: It took us a while to get it together but we love it
customer_reviews.author: Shelli

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install, sturdy, looks good and very good quality
customer_reviews.author: Shafaat Saeed

customer_reviews.title: Grill canopy 5 stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this piece. I suggest having 2 people put this together.
customer_reviews.author: Khristina Freeman

customer_reviews.title: he put it together recently and loved it!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my father for Christmas, he put it together recently and loved it!
customer_reviews.author: courtney

customer_reviews.title: Well made good
customer_reviews.text: Just right to cover our gas grill. Well made good value
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Poor stiching, came apart,
customer_reviews.text: STICHING CAME APART AFTER 1ST MONTH, VERRY TIGHT FIT. STURDY FRAME,
customer_reviews.author: Bruce Saunders

customer_reviews.title: Keep out of rain
customer_reviews.text: Guess I will have to buy a new cover one side filled with rainwater the other side is fine big pocket sure to rip corners out when it keeps filling up
customer_reviews.author: norman ronald petterson jr

customer_reviews.title: Damage In package
customer_reviews.text: I liked it was easy to assembled and what I dislike was when it arrived in the package. It was damage one of the side shelves.
customer_reviews.author: jose

customer_reviews.title: Weak cover
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this may of 2016, put it up June of 2017. Nice cover, but the corner ripped, and it holds water and sags (probably the cause for the strain and tear on the corner) I've (poorly) sewn the corner and it's holding for now
customer_reviews.author: KR

customer_reviews.title: worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Can't beat it for the price just look at the pictures and putting this together took no time at all
customer_reviews.author: patrick kinzel

customer_reviews.title: Worth a try
customer_reviews.text: I like it so far. Make sure you pay attention to the directions but it together.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Holds water
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful canopy, easy set up. But anytime it rains it holds water and stretches out the fabric.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly M.

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied. Item was easy to assembly
customer_reviews.text: Very satisfied . Item was easy to assembly, and very nice after completion .
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Canopy fails in the rain!
customer_reviews.text: This was a great canopy, until it rained. The size and function is great. Unfortunately the first time it rained the canopy failed. I have had this for less than three months.
customer_reviews.author: Tim D.

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Love it, easy to put together and it looks amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Sheri Main

customer_reviews.title: Nice Gazeebo! I'm happy with it although I wish ...
customer_reviews.text: Nice Gazeebo ! I'm happy with it although I wish it were 8x8.
customer_reviews.author: James R.

customer_reviews.title: Priced perfect.
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely pleased with this gazebo. Arrived early. Easy to put together. Good looking piece.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie Perreira

customer_reviews.title: Not much resistance to fading
customer_reviews.text: The canvas faded pretty quickly. Not sure where the resistance was.
customer_reviews.author: Sean M.

customer_reviews.title: Great price! Easy to install.
customer_reviews.text: I love it, it shipped on time. Easy to install.
customer_reviews.author: mary demsky

customer_reviews.title: Best to set up on flat bricks
customer_reviews.text: Easy installation keeps hot sun beaming down on you when grilling grill fits perfect under it and plenty of room
customer_reviews.author: karen Jutkiewicz

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy from Sunjoy
customer_reviews.text: Never ever again would I buy a Sunjoy product. The canopy had two tiny pin holes and I have had the worst luck ever trying to get a new canopy for it. Because I bought it through Amazon Warehouse, there was really no warranty. So I tried working with Sunjoy to get a new canopy and it has been an absolute nightmare. DON'T BUY SUNJOY!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Mileski

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: Great quality product, received very quickly, and easy assembly. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cheap quality
customer_reviews.text: This product seemed great at first but the canopy cloth broke and is no longer solid and steady
customer_reviews.author: EV

customer_reviews.title: Canopy doesn't hold up.
customer_reviews.text: We have only had our canopy set up for 2.5 months and one side of the canopy has already stretched so much that it holds water instead of repelling the water. We are very disappointed with this product and unfortunately the seller does not provide a warranty. There is no reason this canopy should have broke down this quickly.
customer_reviews.author: AH

customer_reviews.title: Make your grilling time fancy!!
customer_reviews.text: The gazebo is awesome. It looks great and covers the large grill we have perfectly. It makes your grill area look so much nicer and keeps the rain and weather off of your grill. Everyone who has come over notices that first and are very impressed by it. You won't find a better deal on this either, trust me I shopped everywhere and did my research. The cheapest you will find one like this in a store is $149 and to get the exact same thing for $89 is amazing. Totally worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Brandie Lynn Musser

customer_reviews.title: This is a very nice, well constructed BBQ Grill Cover
customer_reviews.text: Wow! This is a very nice, well constructed BBQ Grill Cover. It's large enough to cover our Big Green Egg BBQ and still has space. I like the shelves on each side and the utensil hooks. It arrived on time and undamaged. The instructions are easy to follow, if you them! My husband doesn't use them. Assembly was easy and everything fit very well. Only 1 person needed to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: Theresa Holt

customer_reviews.title: Junk save your money.
customer_reviews.text: First one came it was the wrong color. Second one was missing the small top cover fabric. I did not feel like sending back again don't buy.
customer_reviews.author: Charles Peterson

customer_reviews.title: Looks amazing put together. I suggest the green canopy for chat chill vibe!
customer_reviews.text: This fits perfectly on our small apartment patio porch. We just got it up, so don't know about the wind or rain yet. I will review again after we endure the elements. As for as how it looks? It looks awesome with our lights strung up at night. It makes the porch feel magical! * Update on weather resistance. We've had rain, snow and wind.. a TON of wind.. its holding up perfectly!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Sunjoy 8' x 5' Sylvan Soft top Grill Gazebo, Green Top
product_meta.description: Color:GreenGet out of the sun & into the shade beneath this great looking grill gazebo! you'll love the convenience & the protection! you know the Story. You fire up the grill, you're enjoying the conversation & you get caught up in the fun. The next thing you know. Major sunburn. Ouch! well Toss that care out the window. Protect yourself & your grill by adding this handsome grill gazebo. It's designed to hold up & protect you for seasons to come. Easy set-up means that shade is only Min away, giving you more time to focus on honing your grilling skills. Plus, two handy shelves provide ample room for grill accessories, beverages or food. Get this Sunjoy grill gazebo when you want style, convenience & function! order Yours today!
feature_bullets: 8 ft wide to accommodate all grill sizes
Side shelves make a perfect place to rest grill accessories, plates, drinks, etc.
Vented, soft-top canopy provides better stability in windy conditions

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.1 out of 5 stars156 ratings4.1 out of 5 stars
